text: Ara manusera madhye emana'o ache yara allah‌ chara an'yake allah‌ra samakaksarupe grahana kare, tara taderake bhalabase allah‌ra bhalabasara mata'i [1]; paksantare yara imana eneche tara allah‌ke sarbadhika bhalabase [2]. Ara yara yuluma kareche yadi tara ‘ayaba dekhate peta [3], (tabe tara niscita hata ye,) samasta sakti allah‌ra'i. Ara niscaya allah‌ sasti dane kathora
